name: Flashed Podium Chalk
description: When you need your chalk to last a few moves longer, slap on a bit of this. When used as a base for regular chalk, liquid chalk provides an extra layer of grip for friction dependent projects or super-hot days.Creamy textures applies evenly and dries quickly.Made with 80% alcohol base.Contains Silica Gel to keep your hands dry for longer.Compact 100ml size fits in your chalk bucket pocket and is travel friendly.Bottles were updated for 2021 with an easy-to-close lid.
